Description: The Flight into Egypt, with the Virgin mounting the kneeling ass, after Parmigianino Pen and brown ink, with brown wash, over black chalk
Curator's comments: Popham 1967 There is no trace of Denon's collector's mark on 1858,0724.9, so it is possible that the drawing in his possession may have been the original, now lost. 1858,0724.9, is certainly a seventeenth-century copy of the type of those attributed to Vorsterman. See also Pp,2.138
Bibliographic references: Popham (Parma) 1967 / Artists working in Parma in the Sixteenth Century (217)
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Baron Dominique Vivant Denon (See Curatorial comment)
Acquisition notes: There is no trace of Denon's mark, so the drawing in his possession could have been the original, now lost.
